</p>
<h1 align="center">
  Full MarkDown Gatsby - no CMS - Hosted on Netlify
</h1>

Each article is a folder in <i>content/blog</i> holding an index.md file and two sub-folders <i>slider/</i> and <i>gallery/.</i>
Gatsby-Node.js programmatically do all the work, any new folder containing an index.md file inside <i>content/blog</i> is published as an article and any file dropped in Gallery or Slider is published as a slide or gallery item.
